Body:
eda = nk.eda_simulate(duration=30, scr_number=5, drift=0.1, noise=0,
    sampling_rate=250)
signals, info = nk.eda_process(eda, sampling_rate=250)
assert signals.shape == (7500, 11)
assert np.array(['EDA_Raw', 'EDA_Clean', 'EDA_Tonic', 'EDA_Phasic',
    'SCR_Onsets', 'SCR_Peaks', 'SCR_Height', 'SCR_Amplitude',
    'SCR_RiseTime', 'SCR_Recovery', 'SCR_RecoveryTime']
    ) in signals.columns.values
peaks = np.where(signals['SCR_Peaks'] == 1)[0]
onsets = np.where(signals['SCR_Onsets'] == 1)[0]
recovery = np.where(signals['SCR_Recovery'] == 1)[0]
assert peaks.shape == onsets.shape == recovery.shape == (5,)
